info.title: ACM @ UIUC Core API
info.description:
The ACM @ UIUC Core API provides services for managing chapter operations.

## Usage

The primary consumer of the Core API is the Management Portal, which allows members to manage the chapter.
Others may call the API with an API key; please contact us to obtain one.

This API also integrates into the ACM website and other suborganization to provide calendar services.

Calendar clients call the iCal endpoints (available through [ical.acm.illinois.edu](https://ical.acm.illinois.edu)) for calendar services.

## Contact
<hr />

If you are an ACM @ UIUC member, please join the Infra Committee Discord for support.
Otherwise, email [infra@acm.illinois.edu](mailto:infra@acm.illinois.edu) for support.

**For all security concerns, please email [infra@acm.illinois.edu](mailto:infra@acm.illinois.edu) with the subject "Security Concern".**

httpBearer.description:
Authorization: Bearer {token}

This API uses JWT tokens issued by Entra ID (Azure AD) with the Core API audience. Tokens must be included in the Authorization header as a Bearer token for all protected endpoints.

AcmStalenessBoundTimestamp.description: Staleness bound as Unix epoch time (requires authentication to specify)

IllinoisNetId.description: Valid Illinois NetID. See https://answers.uillinois.edu/illinois/page.php?id=78766 for more information.

IllinoisSemesterId.description: Short semester slug for a given semester.

rateLimitExceededError.description: The caller has sent too many requests. Try again later.

totalPaid.description: The total amount paid by the customer, in cents, net of refunds.

refunded.description: Determines whether or not this purchase has been fully refunded to the customer.

fulfilled.description: Determines whether or not this purchase's services/items has already been provided to the customer.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: Retrieve ACM @ UIUC-wide and organization-specific calendars and event metadata.

tags.name: Generic
tags.description: Retrieve metadata about a user or ACM @ UIUC.

tags.name: iCalendar Integration
tags.description: Retrieve Events calendars in iCalendar format (for integration with external calendar clients).

tags.name: IAM
tags.description: Identity and Access Management for internal services.

tags.name: Logging
tags.description: View audit logs for various services.

tags.name: Membership
tags.description: Purchasing or checking ACM @ UIUC membership.

tags.name: Tickets/Merchandise
tags.description: Handling the tickets and merchandise lifecycle.

tags.name: Stripe
tags.description: Collecting payments for ACM @ UIUC invoices and other services.

tags.name: Room Requests
tags.description: Creating room reservation requests for ACM @ UIUC within University buildings.

tags.name: API Keys
tags.description: Manage the lifecycle of API keys.
